# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatTwoComponent8

**Case**

An 8-bit, two-component pixel format with black equal to zero.

## Declaration

```swift
case formatTwoComponent8
```

## Two-component format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatTwoComponent16Half**: A little-endian 16-bit, two-component pixel format.
- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatTwoComponent32Float**: A little-endian 32-bit, two-component pixel format.
title: vImageCVImageFormat.Format.formatTwoComponent8
